rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0181, 2276, 4431, B3701, B6010}
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 06, 09, 09-1, 50}
Must be enrolled in course type {06, 09, 09-1, 09-4, 50}

time: First semester 2017 (On-campus split block of classes)

description: An in-depth introduction to the critical thinking and planning required in the initial stages of a thesis or research project. This unit will focus on the development of research proposal, research model, data analysis and interpretation of results.
